website_summaries.verdict: This docking station can handle most device combinations (with five USB-A, one USB-C and two Thunderbolt 3 ports, plus dual-display support (4K at 60Hz), Ethernet and an SD Card reader for adding portable storage.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: it looks good on my desk, but there are quality control issues. It works most of the time, but I've noticed the following issues... 1) On very hot days the video ports start cutting out. No amount of fiddling fixes this. And its annoyingly inconsistent. 2) The sound port is so bad there is no point using it. It crackles like a cheap pair of headphones. 3) The front USB C port (the one my MBP is plugged into) is a bit loose. It works, just feels insecure. None of these issues are bad enough for me to return the item, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Non

customer_reviews.title: Very good but be careful if you have an HP laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my new HP ZBook 15v G5 laptop. Although it's a very good all-round dock and has the ports I need, it does NOT work with two monitors and my laptop. This is a problem with the laptop and not the dock. I just had a very useful chat with a StarTech support agent. So if you have an HP laptop, check if it has "hybrid graphics" - in which case you will have to do what I do, which is to use this dock for one monitor and the laptop's HDMI for the other.
customer_reviews.author: Steve of London

customer_reviews.title: Works out the box with my MBP 16”
customer_reviews.text: A really well built piece of kit. Does exactly what it says without any fuss. Works out of the box with my MacBook Pro 16”, dual monitors working without the need to any drivers etc. Bonus are the two display ports, so can run two monitors without problem. No lag or quality issues to the display via the unit. Very well built, no noise or excessive heat. Comes well packaged, power adapter with both uk and euro plug adapters. Also has a USB-C cable to connect your laptop to it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sheanie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Does what is says on the tin. I'm connecting a MacBook Pro and want USB (A) and 2 x DisplayPort connections and I get all that. Drives my two 24" Dell monitors (2560x1440) without issue. Also the MacBook charges fine through the thunderbolt connection so I have a single lead to connect up my MacBook.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew King

customer_reviews.title: Best USB-C Dock - It just works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few of the cheaper docks and also a couple of the OWC docks, but none of these are a patch on this StarTech dock. It just works, no firmware upgrades; it is truly just plug and play. I am so impressed that it works, with running dual monitors, external USB, external USB-C - providing power, network cables... etc... It really is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: David Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose dock!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality dock which has some weight to I. I was able to connect my laptop, two screens, keyboard and peripherals to this dock with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs West

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - avoid this adapter for additional displays
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adapter to be used with a new 32-inch 4K monitor (using DisplayPort to HDMI cable) with my MacBook Pro, unfortunately this did not work (despite various debugging and confirmation that the USB port works). Went with a much cheaper adapter which actually worked/extended my display setup.
customer_reviews.author: Giran

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Silly expensive, comes without HDMI cables so you need to get these separately and, won’t work as you can’t install the thunderbolt app via the intel site
customer_reviews.author: Robert Choler

customer_reviews.title: Great Docking Station
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of investigations I purchased this dock. It is great, I just plugged it in, plugged in periferals, turned it on and everything worked. I would have given 5 stars if it was not quite as expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get the drivers!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of work to get it set up, you definitely need to install the drivers and understand what settings your monitors need to be in for dual 4k. But once it's up and running it's a really good dock.
customer_reviews.author: Home Office Rookie

customer_reviews.title: Displayport doesn't work on mac
customer_reviews.text: USB works fine but DisplayPort doesn't show any picture, tried with multiple cables including regular DP to DP and DP to HDMI. Will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaefinis

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with MacBook Pro Thunderbolt 3 and Windows USB C
customer_reviews.text: Delighted to plug this in to my Dell Latitude 5480 USB C as well as Thunderbolt MacBook Pro. Connected to 4K monitor via Displayport and all works fine. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's ok for thunderbolt
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for my dell that it Said it would fit
customer_reviews.author: A man who knows how to get things

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, quick and easy to set up for my MacBook and 2x Dell monitors. Excellent price and performance in comparison to more expensive alternatives on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymo

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: All my peripherals connect no problem (two monitors, ethernet cable and charging devices) to my 2019 MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kausihan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good well built product. No drivers to install just plug and play
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hearn

product_meta.title: StarTech.com Thunderbolt 3 Dock - Dual Monitor 4K 60Hz TB3 Laptop Docking Station with DisplayPort - 85W Power Delivery Charging - 6-Port USB 3.0 Hub, SD 4.0, GbE, Audio - Windows & Mac (TB3DOCK2DPPU)
product_meta.description:
Easily transform your TB3 equipped MacBook Pro or Windows laptop into a dual-4K workstation with up to 40Gbps of throughput. The high-quality Thunderbolt 3 dock features six USB 3.0 ports, 85W Power Delivery to charge your laptop, and an SD card reader.

Create a Dual-4K 60Hz Workstation
This dual-monitor docking station supports 40Gbps speeds and 4K (4096 x 2160) resolution at 60Hz on two monitors, enabling resource-demanding applications on independent displays without draining system resources. The TB3 dock can support 5K (5120 x 2880) resolutions @ 60Hz on a single display.

Connect Your Laptop To:
- 1 x 4K monitor via the DP Port
- 1 x 4K monitor via the TB3 USB-C Port (1.8 m cable included)

OR

- 1 x 5K monitor via the DP and TB3 USB-C ports

Easy Installation & Deployment
Simply connect the TB3 port replicator to your laptop with the included TB3 cable and start working immediately. No time-consuming driver installations are required. Set up a second monitor using the included USB-C to DisplayPort cable adapter, eliminating the need for extra adapters.

Plenty of Ports Including SD Card Reader
The TB3 docking station offers six USB type 3.0 ports, including a Fast-Charge port and USB-C port, a GbE port and audio/microphone port. The built-in SD card reader adds storage not usually available on most docking stations.

85W Power Delivery
Using a single cable, the universal laptop docking station provides up to 85W of Power Delivery to power and charge your laptop, and power your peripherals with its 180W power adapter.

TB3DOCK2DPPU is backed by a StarTech.com 3-year warranty and free lifetime technical support.



LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Product is sourced and shipped from the European Economic Area (EEA). Product is genuine original from manufacturer authorized distributors.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x docking station
Thunderbolt 3 cable
USB-C to DisplayPort cable
universal power adapter
2^power cords (UK, EU)
instruction manual

See more
feature_bullets: THUNDERBOLT 3 CERTIFIED DOCK: Aluminum, 40Gbps dual 4K 60Hz DP & TB3 (USB-C) video output or single monitor 5K 30Hz, 85W PD, USB 3.0 Hub, SD 4.0 card reader, Gigabit Ethernet & Headset port
85W POWER DELIVERY: Thunderbolt 3 Dock can power and charge Ultrabooks & workstation laptops such as MacBook Pro (15 & 16), MacBook Air, HP, Lenovo ThinkPad & Dell XPS using macOS, Windows
MORE USB DEVICE PORTS: TB3 docking station has a 6-port USB 3.1 Gen 1 5Gbps Hub (5x USB-A, 1x USB-C ports) w/ 1x BC 1.2 (1.5A) fast charging always-on port that works with or without laptop connected

EASY TO SET UP & DEPLOY: This universal Thunderbolt 3 Dock has automatic driver setup and incl. a 6ft (1.8m) USB Type-C to DisplayPort cable to connect a second DP monitor & a Thunderbolt 3 host cable

FLEXIBLE THUNDERBOLT 3 PORT: Thunderbolt 3 port replicator w/ downstream TB3 port that supports 3 modes of operation: 2nd monitor, daisy chain up to 5 TB3 peripherals, or connect USB Type-C accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
